metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.
metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, PHP, Python, Bootstrap, Java and XML.

content.text: TypeScript Syllabus
Introduction
The W3Schools TypeScript Tutorial is comprehensive and beginner-friendly.
content.html: The W3Schools TypeScript Tutorial is comprehensive and beginner-friendly.

content.text: It will give you a fundamental knowledge of TypeScript.
content.html: It will give you a fundamental knowledge of TypeScript.

content.text: It is designed for beginners and requires only basic JavaScript knowledge.
content.html: It is designed for beginners and requires only basic JavaScript knowledge.

content.text: The content has been carefully made to be bite-sized, simple, and easy to understand.
content.html: The content has been carefully made to be bite-sized, simple, and easy to understand.

content.text: The content has been proven by millions of users over the years. It is updated and improved frequently.
content.html: The content has been proven by millions of users over the years. It is updated and improved frequently.

content.text: The syllabus outline and its sequence are structured so you can learn TypeScript step by step, from the introduction to advanced features.
content.html: The syllabus outline and its sequence are structured so you can learn TypeScript step by step, from the introduction to advanced features.

content.text: Get Started With TypeScript »
content.html: Get Started With TypeScript »

content.text: Learning Outcomes

Note: Are you a teacher teaching TypeScript? W3Schools Academy is a toolbox of features that can help you teach. It offers classroom features such as pre-built study plans, classroom administration and much more. Read more about Academy here .
content.html: Note: Are you a teacher teaching TypeScript? W3Schools Academy is a toolbox of features that can help you teach. It offers classroom features such as pre-built study plans, classroom administration and much more. Read more about Academy here.

content.text: Which Subjects Are TypeScript Relevant For?

content.text: Activities

content.html: In this tutorial we offer different activities for you to learn TypeScript for free:

You can also create a free account to track your progress.
content.html: You can also create a free account to track your progress.

content.html: As a signed-in user, you get access to features such as:

content.text: Overview of the Modules
Get Started
content.html: Get Started

content.text: Sandbox and Lab Environment
TypeScript, like any programming language, is best learned through hands-on practice.
content.html: TypeScript, like any programming language, is best learned through hands-on practice.

content.text: Try this example using our editor:
content.html: Try this example using our editor:

content.code_html: console.log('Hello World!');

content.text: If you want to explore more and host your project, we have a feature called Spaces that allows you to build, test and run TypeScript applications for free.
content.html: If you want to explore more and host your project, we have a feature called Spaces that allows you to build, test and run TypeScript applications for free.

content.text: Here you get a secure sandbox environment called Spaces, where you can practice TypeScript code and test projects in real-time.
content.html: Here you get a secure sandbox environment called Spaces, where you can practice TypeScript code and test projects in real-time.

content.text: Spaces allow you to test, build, and deploy code. This includes a W3Schools subdomain, hosting, and secure SSL certificates.
content.html: Spaces allow you to test, build, and deploy code. This includes a W3Schools subdomain, hosting, and secure SSL certificates.

content.text: Spaces require no installation and run directly in the browser.
content.html: Spaces require no installation and run directly in the browser.

content.text: Features include:
content.html: Features include:

content.text: Create a Spaces Account
content.html: Create a Spaces Account

content.text: TypeScript Certification
W3Schools offers an end-of-pathway certification program.
content.html: W3Schools offers an end-of-pathway certification program.

content.text: Here you can take exams to get certified.
content.html: Here you can take exams to get certified.

content.text: The TypeScript exam is a test that summarizes the W3Schools TypeScript syllabus.
content.html: The TypeScript exam is a test that summarizes the W3Schools TypeScript syllabus.

content.text: After passing the exam you get the "Certified TypeScript Developer" Certification.
content.html: After passing the exam you get the "Certified TypeScript Developer" Certification.

content.text: There are two different types of certifications:
content.html: There are two different types of certifications:

content.text: The non-adaptive is pass or no pass.
content.html: The non-adaptive is pass or no pass.

content.text: The adaptive certification exam is adaptive and graded; students will get a grade from intermediate, advanced to professional.
content.html: The adaptive certification exam is adaptive and graded; students will get a grade from intermediate, advanced to professional.

content.text: Buy Certificate »
content.html: Buy Certificate »

content.text: Are You a Teacher?
Are you interested in learning how you can use W3Schools Academy to Teach TypeScript?
content.html: Are you interested in learning how you can use W3Schools Academy to Teach TypeScript?

content.text: Watch a demo of W3Schools Academy . You'll see how it works, and discover how it can make teaching programming easier and more engaging.
content.html: Watch a demo of W3Schools Academy. You'll see how it works, and discover how it can make teaching programming easier and more engaging.
